short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monochrome Mode: Grayscale browsing for focus and readability.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Monochrome Mode turns all websites grayscale, giving you a clean, distraction-free browsing experience. It's perfect for reading long articles, coding, or simply taking a break from the overwhelming colors of the web.

Try Monochrome Mode today and see how it can improve your browsing experience!

HOW TO USE?
Activating Monochrome Mode is simple: Just click on the extension icon to toggle between color and grayscale.
